forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 71F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers late. Thunder is possible early. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Thunder possible. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
